name.ja: <ruby>蕾禍<rt>ライカ</rt></ruby>ノ<ruby>曝藤<rt>サラシフジ</rt></ruby>

text.en: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Plant/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1600/DEF 0) (this card is also still a Trap), then, if you control a "Ragnaraika" Link Monster, you can banish up to 2 cards from your opponent's GY. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 2 Insect, Plant, and/or Reptile monsters from your GY and/or banishment into the Deck, and if you do, Set this card. You can only use this effect of "Ragnaraika Bleached Wisteria" once per turn.
